newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Delta Lloyd ups Pakhoed to Buy.
newsitem.headline: Delta Lloyd ups Pakhoed to Buy.

text.p: First-half profits higher than expected and outlook improving given restructuring in Rotterdam, margin improvement and better contract position of chemicals shipping. Company more dollar-sensitive as U.S. activities increased. For every 0.10 guilder rise of the dollar rate, Pakhoed profit rises by 4.5 million guilders. Company seen creating value from 1997 as return on capital employed now higher than cost of capital.
Estimates (NLG): EPS* pvs EPS P/E P/CF Dividend
* NOTE - earnings per share from ordinary operations, excluding non-recurring items
